name: AudioFileMarker
desc: Annotates a position in an audio file.

items.name: init(mFramePosition: Float64, mName: Unmanaged<CFString>?, mMarkerID: Int32, mSMPTETime: AudioFile_SMPTE_Time, mType: UInt32, mReserved: UInt16, mChannel: UInt16)
var mChannel: UInt16
items.desc: The channel number referred to by the marker. Set to 0 if the marker applies to all channels.

items.name: var mFramePosition: Float64
items.desc: The frame in the file, counting from the start of the audio data.

items.name: var mMarkerID: Int32
items.desc: A unique ID for the marker.

items.name: var mSMPTETime: AudioFile_SMPTE_Time
items.desc: The SMPTE time for this marker.
